reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, not itchy at all, and appreciate its soft material, perfect for chilly winter days.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sweater… you need 3!
items.body: I love this sweater so much that I bought it in 2 colors. The quality of the material is soft and not scratch at all. I bought the pink and beige color and they look just like the picture just slightly more muted which I personally loved. The fit is overiszed and long so perfect for leggings but I loved with my jeans. The mock neck is not tight at all. Lightweight so I do layer when it is really cold. I’ve washed and hung dry it did not shrink or wash weird. No color change or weird smell when coming out of the package. IYKYK. Read more
items.author: Dylan Anthony

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and Stylish Oversized Sweater!
items.body: I recently purchased the Saodimallsu Women’s Oversized Sweater, I was influenced by a TT content creator! It has quickly become one of my favorites! The thick, fluffy fabric is incredibly soft and perfect for staying warm during cooler days. I love how effortlessly stylish this sweater is; I paired it with leather leggings and my combat Doc Martens, both of which I also found on Amazon. The combination is both chic and comfortable, making it perfect for casual outings. The oversized fit is flattering and cozy, allowing for easy layering without sacrificing style. Whether I'm running errands or just relaxing with a good book, this sweater keeps me feeling great. Overall, I highly recommend the Saodimallsu Oversized Sweater for anyone looking to add a touch of comfort and style to their wardrobe. It's versatile, soft, and sure to keep you looking fabulous! Read more
items.author: Sharron

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy this! Horrible quality!
items.body: Oh my god this sweater is terrible! This is what they sent me (the dark gray) and this is what the picture looked like from which I ordered from! Not to mention, do you see the bottom? It permanently rolls up all the way around! No matter how much I tried pushing it down, folding it the opposite way, you name it. And it is so thin I swear to God this thing is going to unravel if I put it on. Save your money and don’t buy this horribly made sweater! Read more
items.author: Diana E. Mason

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unflattering Oversized Sweater
items.body: Honestly I love an oversized sweater. However, I returned it because it was way boxier/unflattering than I expected. It was soft, but I’m not sure how durable it would be long term after washing. Also, the way the neckline fit wasn’t like it thought. Worth ordering and trying but didn’t love and returned. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but short (ordered a size medium)
items.body: Cute. Comfy. Definitely fits over sized but it’s a tiny bit short. So it kinda looks like a bell shape lol but still cute I ordered a size medium Read more
items.author: Tabatha Figueroa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater.
items.body: Runs big, choose maybe one size smaller than you normally order. great for around the house and out and about, comfortable, soft, it’s on the thinner side, not super thick, great for people who run on the warm temp. Love the style with some baggy pants. I wash in cold and dry on my sweater drying rack. No piling. Read more
items.author: Lauren

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chunky and Oversized and Perfect!
items.body: Love this sweater. I have it in 2 colors. It is oversized and chunky, which is exactly what I wanted for my trip to the mountains. Kept me warm. The quality is great. I've washed it, but I don't dry my sweaters so I didn't experience what others did (pilling). There is some "shedding" at the sleeves at first, but it wasn't bad. I'm 5'1", 180lbs and got the XL. It is perfect. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it and would buy more colors.
items.body: Nice sweater. Fits just as I like it. Very soft. Sleeves are just the right length. I’m 5’4, 232 lbs. I got the XL. Read more
items.author: Dina

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Brown, Creamy-white, Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Orange, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
